com.salesmanager.core.business.utils

Class ProductPriceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesmanager.core.business.utils.ProductPriceUtils

  • @Component(value="priceUtil")
public class ProductPriceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class determines the price that is displayed in the catalogue for a given item. It does not calculate the total price for a given item
    Author:
    casams1

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProductPriceUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAdminFormatedAmount(com.salesmanager.core.model.merchant.MerchantStore store, java.math.BigDecimal amount)
      This is the format that will be displayed in the admin input text fields when editing an entity having a BigDecimal to be displayed as a raw amount 1,299.99 The admin user will also be force to input the amount using that format
      java.lang.String getAdminFormatedAmountWithCurrency(com.salesmanager.core.model.merchant.MerchantStore store, java.math.BigDecimal amount)
      This method will return the required formated amount with the appropriate currency
      java.math.BigDecimal getAmount(java.lang.String amount)
      Transformation of an amount of money submited by the admin user to be inserted as a BigDecimal in the database
      com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.price.FinalPrice getFinalPrice(com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.Product product)
      This is the final price calculated from all configured prices and all possibles discounts.
      com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.price.FinalPrice getFinalProductPrice(com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.Product product, java.util.List<com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.attribute.ProductAttribute> attributes)
      This method calculates the final price taking into account all attributes included having a specified default attribute with an attribute price gt 0 in the product object.
      java.lang.String getFormatedAmountWithCurrency(com.salesmanager.core.model.reference.currency.Currency currency, java.math.BigDecimal amount)
      Returns a formatted amount using Shopizer Currency requires internal java.util.Currency populated
      java.lang.String getFormatedAmountWithCurrency(java.util.Locale locale, com.salesmanager.core.model.reference.currency.Currency currency, java.math.BigDecimal amount) 
      java.lang.String getFormatedAmountWithCurrency(com.salesmanager.core.model.merchant.MerchantStore store, java.math.BigDecimal amount, java.util.Locale locale)
      This amount will be displayed to the end user
      java.math.BigDecimal getOrderProductTotalPrice(com.salesmanager.core.model.merchant.MerchantStore store, com.salesmanager.core.model.order.orderproduct.OrderProduct orderProduct) 
      java.math.BigDecimal getPrice(com.salesmanager.core.model.merchant.MerchantStore store, com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.Product product, java.util.Locale locale)
      Get the price without discount
      java.lang.String getStoreFormatedAmountWithCurrency(com.salesmanager.core.model.merchant.MerchantStore store, java.math.BigDecimal amount)
      This method has to be used to format store front amounts It will display national format amount ex: $1,345.99 Rs.1.345.99 or international format USD1,345.79 INR1,345.79
      boolean hasDiscount(com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.price.ProductPrice productPrice)
      Determines if a ProductPrice has a discount

        public com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.price.FinalPrice getFinalProductPrice(com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.Product product,
                                                                                         java.util.List<com.salesmanager.core.model.catalog.product.attribute.ProductAttribute> attributes)
        This method calculates the final price taking into account all attributes included having a specified default attribute with an attribute price gt 0 in the product object. The calculation is based on the default price. Attributes may be null
